text: Amargadh (also known as Jithari) is a village in Sihor, Bhavnagar district, Gujarat, India. It has a famous tuberculosis hospital, the K. J. Mehta T.B. Hospital, built on land donated by Maharaja Krishnakumar Sihji. There is also the College of Dental Science, with a research center on the campus. ==References== Category:Villages in Bhavnagar district
title: Amargadh
